Steps.Message: Update at 08:26 - Our team of specialist engineers have arrived on site. To allow them time to locate the fault and make the repairs, we've changed the estimated time to between 11:30 and 12:30. If you have a vulnerable person at home, please call us on 08003163105 and we'll see if we can provide any additional support.

We became aware of a power cut at 05:01. We’re sorry for any disruption this may have caused you. We didn’t know in advance there would be a power cut but now that we know, our teams will do everything they can to get your power back quickly.
Steps.Name: Power cut reported

Steps.Message: We have engineers on their way. As this is affecting your area, they will not need to attend your property. Rest assured once they arrive, they’ll work as quickly as is safely possible to get your power back on.
Steps.Name: Engineers on their way

Steps.Message: Engineers are now on site, carrying out investigations into the fault. Once they have completed their assessment, they will carry out repairs.
Steps.Name: Engineers investigating and fixing

Logs.Comment: Update at 08:26 - Our team of specialist engineers have arrived on site. To allow them time to locate the fault and make the repairs, we've changed the estimated time to between 11:30 and 12:30. If you have a vulnerable person at home, please call us on 08003163105 and we'll see if we can provide any additional support.

IncidentCategoryCustomerFriendlyDescript: A fault occurred on an underground electricity cable affecting the local area.
